## Description {#details}

This is a MessagePack reader.

See <a href="https://github.com/msgpack/msgpack/blob/master/spec.md">https://github.com/msgpack/msgpack/blob/master/spec.md</a> for the full standard.

Typical usage: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">     StringRef input = GetInput();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">     msgpack::Reader MPReader(input);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">     msgpack::Object Obj;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">   </Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">     </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">       Expected&lt;bool&gt; ReadObj = MPReader.read(&amp;Obj);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ReadObj)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Handle error...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ReadObj.get())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Reached end of input</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Obj.Kind) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> msgpack::Type::Int:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//       // Use Obj.Int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">       </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">       &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><Highlight kind="normal">     &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Reads MessagePack objects from memory, one at a time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msgpack/reader"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msgpack/reader/#a3ee641a54e5b81c096f00f0dea4a9020">Reader</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Read one object from the input buffer, advancing past it.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The \\p Obj is updated with the kind of the object read, and the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// corresponding union member is updated.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// For the collection objects (Array and Map), only the length is read, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the caller must make and additional \\c N calls (in the case of Array) or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\c N&#42;2 calls (in the case of Map) to \\c Read to retrieve the collection</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// elements.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param &#91;out&#93; Obj filled with next object on success.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\returns true when object successfully read, false when at end of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// input (and so \\p Obj was not updated), otherwise an error.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;bool&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msgpack/reader/#a4f20ee2ca37e3839b73900aef8e26ac5">read</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/msgpack/object">Object</a> &amp;Obj);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a20d37563688a61a452fb26e317e37308">StringRef::iterator</a> End;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> remainingSpace() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The rest of the code maintains the invariant that End &gt;= Current, so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that this cast is always defined behavior.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(End - Current);</Highlight></CodeLine>
